DOC.brief_summary: This study aim understand metaplasticity association transcranial direct current stimulation ( tDCS ) physical exercise . For purpose , study separate 2 phase : first phase aim verify effect physical exercise cortical excitability . After 1st phase two intensity physical exercise choose second phase . In 2nd phase , subject undergo anodal , cathodal sham tDCS plus physical exercise .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Transcranial Direct Current Stimulation Associated With Physical Exercise : Metaplasticity Study
DOC.detailed_description: Before two phase study , subject evaluate follow aspect : anxiety beck anxiety inventory ; depression beck depression inventory ; level physical exercise international physical activity questionnaire ; stress stress perceive scale 10 . In first phase , subject undergo 4 condition : ( ) 15 minute physical exercise moderate intensity ; ( ii ) 10 minute physical exercise high intensity ; ( iii ) 30 minute physical exercise mild intensity ; ( iv ) 15 30 minute rest . Before condition , cortical excitability measure Transcranial magnetic stimulation motor evoke potential ( MEP ) ; blood glucose level evaluate glucometer . The MEP also do immediately physical exercise every 5 min 30 end exercise/rest . The blood glucose level do immediately exercise.. In second phase , subject undergo 6 condition : ( ) anodal tDCS + physical exercise 1 ; ( ii ) anodal tDCS + physical exercise 2 ; ( iii ) cathodal tDCS + physical exercise 1 ; ( iv ) cathodal tDCS + physical exercise 2 ; ( v ) sham tDCS + physical exercise 1 ; ( vi ) sham tDCS + physical exercise 2 . The intensity time physical exercise depend result previous phase determine end phase 1 . In phase , blood glucose level evaluate immediately physical exercise . The cortical excitability evaluate Transcranial magnetic stimulation follow measure : motor evoke potential - tDCS , tDCS , immediately , 10 , 20 , 30 , 60 , 90 minute exercise ; rest motor threshold - tdcs , immediately 90 minute exercise ; recruitment curve - tdcs , immediately 90 minute exercise . tDCS condition During tDCS application , patient seat comfortable chair head arm rest . Current apply DC stimulator ( NeuroConn , Germany ) use pair saline-soaked sponge electrode ( surface 35 36cm² ) . tDCS apply Cz Oz accord International 10-20 EEG system . In anodal tDCS , anode place Cz cathode Oz . In cathodal tDCS inverse position do . Parameters current intensity duration ( dose ) use previously establish poststroke patient : 2 mA stimulation intensity 20 minute current ramp 10 second . Sham tDCS use several study evaluate effect active tDCS . For sham , position anodal tDCS assume , however , current duration 30 second , current ramp 10 second . Moreover , electrostimulation device automatically turn without patient 's perception . Thus , patient experience early sensation ( mild moderate tingling ) stimulation site without induce effect . Moreover , tDCS session , patient answer adverse effect questionnaire . Physical exercise condition The intensity physical exercise determine maximum heart rate ( max HR ) use formula ( 220 - age ) . For high intensity , intensity xx xx % maxHR ; moderate intensity , 64-76 % maxHR ; mild intensity , 57-63 % maxHR . Furthermore , physical exercise heart rate continuous evaluate POLAR rate perceive scale register 3 minute modify Borg scale Outcome measure Evaluation brain activity perform use single-pulse transcranial magnetic stimulation ( TMS-p ) . Magnetic stimulation ( Neurosoft , Russia ) apply figure-8 coil determine motor cortex representation right tibial anterior muscle ( hotspot ) perform follow electrophysiological measure assess cortical activity : ( ) Motor Evoked Potential ( MEP ) ; ( ii ) rest motor threshold ( RMT ) ( iii ) Recruitment curve ( RC ) . Firstly , patient instruct sit chair search comfortable position . The hotspot consider excitable area , intense motor evoke potential ( MEP ) , measure electromyography . The following electrophysiological measure perform leave cerebral hemisphere assess cortical activity : ( ) Motor Evoked Potential ( MEP ) : intensity magnetic stimulator adjust produce average MEP 0.4 mV . TMS-p applied area cortical representation tibial anterior mean response stimuli reach 0.4 0.6 mV . ( ii ) Resting motor threshold ( RMT ) : request patient perform contraction tibial anterior muscle , give ten pulse TMS-p determinate rest motor threshold . Motor threshold corresponds low intensity TMS-p produce MEP 50μV 50 % pulse apply hotspot . ( iii ) Recruitment curve ( RC ) : Five stimulus apply follow intensity : 5 % rest motor threshold ( RMT ) , RMT , 5 % RMT , 10 % RMT , 20 % RMT , 30 % RMT , 35 % RMT 100 % stimulator output . The five stimulus intensity deliver block , order stimulation intensity change random . The interval successive TMS stimuli 5.5 6.5 .
DOC.criteria: Self report healthy Right hand Prior neurological disease Multiple brain lesion Metal implant skull face Pacemaker History seizures Epilepsy Pregnancy Hemodynamic instability Use medication change cortical excitability , antidepressant , anxiolytic . Energy expenditure > 3000 METS
